name: Str build with epic dodge challenge
author: KidMiracleman

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
Is it possible to get a str build with 37 strength and epic dodge at level 40??

David

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: At level forty? Absolutely impossible! At level sixty wiith your legendary levels it might be possible just barely though, judging from my own build for Dodji Domotai.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
My own build ends with STR26/ DEX 25.

Now if your friend means that you can achieve STR 37 With the +12 Enhancements, then that is indeed possible. But as i remember for that shield you want, you need 37 STR natural, right? If so, then it is impossible to achieve that within 40 levels, no matter what.

An Elven Bard 16/ RDD 14/ SD 10 can come close to that but no way you can have both natural STR 37/ DEX 25 with any kind of build.

I think, the best you can do is come to a natural STR 34/ DEX 25 with this build and that is by devoting almost all of your Epic Feats to ability increases and starting with STR 16/ DEX 19 with an Elf.

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content: Sounds good. Con?? I am pretty sure he is talking about a natural 37. He probably uses a subrace that gives added str at creation

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content: I wonder if a 27 str 25 dex and 22 con is possible

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Ah, the sub-race would explain it.

CON for that Elf Bard 16/ RDD 14/ SD 10 is abysmal, you don't want to hear it really...

Heck, you must have at least 11 CHA as well, cause you are a Bard, so that leads to an unavoidable:  STR 16  DEX 19  CON 06  INT 10  WIS 08  CHA 13

Now let's assume that you devote all six of your available Epic General Feats for ability increases (The seventh one is for the ED), and let's calculate the RDD increases as well:  STR 34  DEX 25  CON 08  INT 12  WIS 08  CHA 15

The RDD bonus feat you can take it as either Armour Skin OR Epic Prowess, the second is better in this case, because your AB will suck already without EWF.

Well, i got really close it seems, and with the aid of a strong sub-race you will be able to make that build indeed although you are missing serious feats like EWF. Your AB will be something like 39 even without it , cause RDD is OP as hell.


Anyway, hope you enjoy it
